name: Selector
desc: The selector objects available to filter returned data.

items.name: conditions
items.desc: A list of condition objects that allow users to filter a list of records.

items.name: fields
items.desc: A list of field names to return within each record.

items.name: orderBy
items.desc: A list of field names and grouping to sort the records by ASCENDING or DESCENDING.

items.name: pagination
items.desc: A defined range and limit of the number of returned records.
